title: How is a life of a lateral entry student ???
content: Yo , i just got finished my 1st round councelling for Diploma CET and have gotte PES EC campus ( btech in AM ) , how does it work for lateral entry students?? do we need to clear specific courses of 1st year in 3rd sem & 4th sem or not? also is it as academically stressfull as people make it out to be online???

comments.body: It might be slightly stressful , I'd suggest focus on making good friends as they'd really help you navigate in projects , assignments etc .I saw lateral entry folks keeping to themselves and not mingling much ,which also reflected in their academic performance.
what about the courses we have to complete during 3rd sem , anyidea ? i hear M1 and M2 is removed in some VTU collages for lateral entry students
